Package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler

Class ResConsBackfillScheduler

java.lang.Object
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.SimEntity
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler.AbstractScheduler
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler.BackfillingScheduler
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler.ConsBackfillScheduler
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler.ResConsBackfillScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventSink<SimEvent>, ListenerService<WorkUnitEvent,EventListener<WorkUnitEvent>>, ReservationScheduler, Scheduler
public class ResConsBackfillScheduler extends ConsBackfillScheduler implements ReservationScheduler
ResConsBackfillScheduler class is an allocation policy for Server that implements conservative backfilling and supports advance reservations. The policy is based on the conservative backfilling algorithm described in the following papers:
  • Dror G. Feitelson and Ahuva Mu'alem Weil, Utilization and Predictability in Scheduling the IBM SP2 with Backfilling, in Proceedings of the 12th International Parallel Processing Symposium on International Parallel Processing Symposium (IPPS 1998), pp. 542-546.
  • Ahuva W. Mu'alem and Dror G. Feitelson, Utilization, Predictability, Workloads, and User Runtime Estimates in Scheduling the IBM SP2 with Backfilling. IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems, 12:(6), pp. 529-543, 2001.
Similarly to ConsBackfillScheduler this scheduler relies on the availability profile provided by ResourcePool. The difference is that in many cases an advance reservation will require two entries in the profile, namely to mark its start time and its finish time. In addition, when a job is cancelled, advance reservations are not removed from the availability profile and therefore are not moved forwards in the scheduling queue.
This scheduler supports parallel jobs and some AR functionalities, such as:
  • process a new reservation
  • cancel a reservation
Author:
Marcos Dias de Assuncao

    • scheduleReservationJob

      protected void scheduleReservationJob(long time, Job job, RangeList res)
      Allocates a resource to a given job for which a reservation has previously been made. Schedules a SimEvent.Type.TASK_COMPLETE event to be handled at job completion and a SimEvent.Type.TASK_START if the job's start time is in the future
      Parameters:
      time - the start time of the allocation
      job - the job to which the resource will be allocated
      res - the resource range list to be allocated.

    • sendReservationToOwner

      protected void sendReservationToOwner(Reservation r)
      Sends a reservation back to its owner. That is, schedules an event for the owner to receive the completed reservation and process it.
      Parameters:
      r - the reservation to be returned to the owner
